text: Pivenfrine (INN), also known as pivalylphenylephrine, is a sympathomimetic and mydriatic agent. ==See also== * Phenylephrine ==References== Category:Alpha- adrenergic agonists Category:Phenethylamines Category:Sympathomimetics Category:Phenols Category:Secondary alcohols Category:Amines Category:Pivalates
title: Pivenfrine
